info.narration: #0 is on their way to $0’s Containment Unit to begin the work process.

collection.name: Spider Bud
collection.openText: Unsurprisingly, not a single employee volunteered to retrieve the corpse of their cocooned colleague.

specialTipSize.specialTip: Employees with Prudence Level 1 squashed the spiderlings. $0 turned those who harmed its children into cocoons.
When cleaning the unit due as a part of Insight Work, #0 was quickly turned into a cocoon by $0.
$0’s cocoons produce PE-Boxes. Additional cocoons mean a greater number of produced PE-Boxes.
